OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients also undergo abdominal radiotherapy whole lung radiotherapy ( pulmonary metastasis present ) . - Stratum 8 ( stage II-IV DA Wilms ' tumor ) : Patients receive treatment stratum 7 . - Stratum 9 ( stage I-IV rhabdoid tumor ) : After nephrectomy , patient receive carboplatin IV day 1-2 VP-16 IV 1 hour ( begin carboplatin infusion ) day 1-3 week 0 , 3 , 9 , 12 , 18 , 21 CTX IV 1 hour day 1-5 week 6 , 15 , 24 . G-CSF administer stratum 7 . Patients also undergo radiotherapy . ( The rhabdoid tumor stratum close accrual effective 07/13/2001 . ) After completion chemotherapy , patient undergo second-look laparotomy partial nephrectomy wedge excision ( feasible ) . After second-look surgery , patient without persistent residual disease resume chemotherapy . Patients follow every 3 month 5 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually 3 year .
